abstract: The automaker said certain Chrysler 200s with V6 engines could not be shifted into park.
snippet: The automaker said certain Chrysler 200s with V6 engines could not be shifted into park.
lead_paragraph: Fiat Chrysler Automobiles is recalling more than 25,000 vehicles worldwide for a transmission problem that may prevent the cars from being shifted into park.

headline.main: 25,000 Chrysler Cars Recalled for Transmission Problem
